column4: is it possible to get gnome3 to work under 12.04 in virtualbox? Tried two ways - a guide or in update center - but it doesnt look like gnome3 :/
You need to have Guest Additions installed
ah- didnt think i have that now - ill try
almost done, and after that I should.. restart or?
Well I guess so, you can simply restart X
it still looks like an old gnome - tookt "Gnome" in list (there was three) - can it be that update center overwritten to an older version - and can I check
Do you have the gnome-shell package installed?
it says "gnome-shell" is allready the newest version
Hm... Odd. I'm not sure then.
It loads the GNOME Fallback session in your case (which happens when it can't load the standard Shell for some reason, or when you pick it from the list)
Well, try to pick the "other" GNOME from the list then
